### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE portfolio_investments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name VARCHAR(255),
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT,
    current_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES portfolio_investments(id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM portfolio_investments WHERE id = 1;

  performance DECIMAL(5, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES Investments(id)
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name STRING,
    investment_type STRING,
    investment_amount DECIMAL
  )

CREATE TABLE investors (
    investor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_name STRING,
    investor_email STRING,
    investment_id UUID REFERENCES investments(investment_id)
  )

CREATE TABLE performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id UUID REFERENCES investments(investment_id),
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_value DECIMAL
  )

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    investment_id UUID REFERENCES investments(investment_id),
    investor_id UUID REFERENCES investors(investor_id),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL
  )
